entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Freezing rain beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
